confirmation.sure: (FR) Are you sure you want to close this quiz? You will lose your progress.

landing.p1: (FR) Not sure you've checked all the boxes to retire? Take this quiz as a first step towards your retirement checklist.
landing.p2: (FR) Your answers will help identify government pensions and benefits you could receive. They will also guide you on what to consider to better prepare for retirement.
landing.p3: (FR) You don't need any special information to take this quiz. To create the most appropriate retirement checklist, you will need to provide information on the following:
landing.legal: (FR) legal status (such as Canadian citizen, Indian Status, or permanent resident)
landing.residence: (FR) residence history (number of years lived in Canada)
landing.retirement: (FR) retirement plan (when you plan on retiring, where you plan on living in retirement, etc.)

question-1.title: (FR) When do you plan on retiring?
(FR) Select all that apply to you. You are...

question-3.title: (FR) How financially prepared do you feel for retirement?
question-3.subtitle: (FR) Do you feel confident that you have enough money to support your lifestyle and future plans in retirement?

question-4.title: (FR) Where do you plan on living when you retire?
question-4.option-2: (FR) In Canada MORE Than 6 Months a Year
question-4.option-3: (FR) In Canada LESS than 6 months a year
question-4.option-2-label: (FR) In Canada more than 6 months a year
question-4.option-3-label: (FR) In Canada less than 6 months a year

question-5.title: (FR) Do you plan to earn money while receiving retirement benefits
question-5.subtitle: (FR) Some people choose to work or earn money in retirement. This can affect your monthly pension amounts.

question-6.title: (FR) When you retire, what will your legal status be in Canada?
question-6.option-2: (FR) MÃ©tis, Inuit, or Member of First Nation
question-6.option-3: (FR) Sponsored Resident (less than 10 years in Canada)

question-7.title: (FR) From age 18, how many years will you have lived in Canada when you apply for retirement benefits?
